about.name: Professional with years of experience in the IT sector.
about.description:
From code to strategy: I design the digital architecture of your business.
With a solid academic background and years of hands-on experience, I help companies and professionals overcome technological challenges with tailored solutions that grow with your goals.
I don’t just write code: I build scalable tools and efficient processes to make your business run smoothly.

What I can do for you:
• Custom Software Development: scalable solutions designed for your specific needs.
• Strategic Consulting: optimization of IT infrastructure and business processes.
• Technology Innovation: integration of new technologies to keep your company competitive.

items.title: FULL STACK DEVELOPMENT
items.description: Development of complete web and mobile applications, handling frontend, backend, and integrations with modern and scalable technologies.
items.details:
Complete Web and Mobile Applications

I provide full stack development services, managing every technical aspect of the project: from architecture design to development, deployment, and ongoing evolution.

I work on both the frontend, creating modern and intuitive interfaces, and the backend, developing robust, secure, and scalable application logic. When needed, I also deliver mobile applications integrated with existing systems.

Technologies I use

Frontend: React, Vue.js, Angular; Backend: Node.js, .NET; Mobile: React Native. Technology is never an end, but a tool: if the project requires it, I evaluate and use different stacks.

What I deliver

  • Custom web applications
  • Corporate and management platforms
  • Backend APIs and services
  • Integrations with external systems (CRM, ERP, payments, cloud services)
  • Cross-platform mobile applications
  • Refactoring and optimization of existing projects

Who can benefit

  • Companies looking to digitize processes or build custom solutions
  • Startups needing a solid and scalable product
  • Technical teams seeking expert support in frontend, backend, or architecture
  • Entrepreneurs and professionals looking for a single reliable technical reference

items.title: CONSULTING
items.description: Evaluation of your IT needs and personalized strategies.
items.details:
IT and Technology Consulting

Clarity, strategy, and informed technical decisions

I offer IT consulting services to help companies, startups, software houses, and web agencies make solid technology decisions, reducing risks, time waste, and unnecessary costs. The consulting process transforms business needs into sustainable, aligned technical solutions.

What consulting includes

I assist clients and teams in all decision-making stages, providing a clear and independent technical perspective:

  • Analysis of business needs and objectives
  • Evaluation of software architectures and technology stacks
  • Support in defining technical roadmaps
  • Informed technology choices (stack, framework, cloud, integrations)
  • Review of existing or planned solutions
  • Support for CTOs, PMs, and non-technical stakeholders

When consulting is useful

  • Starting a new project and wanting a solid foundation
  • Existing projects that do not scale or perform adequately
  • Uncertainty about which technologies to adopt
  • Evaluating vendors or alternative solutions
  • Needing a second technical opinion before major decisions

Who benefits

  • Companies seeking more effective technology decisions
  • Startups validating ideas and architectures
  • Software houses needing external technical advice
  • Web agencies requiring strategic support for complex projects
  • Entrepreneurs and decision-makers seeking clarity without unnecessary technicalities

items.title: PROJECT MANAGEMENT & TECH LEAD
items.description: Complete management of complex technology projects.
items.details:
Project Management & Tech Lead

Comprehensive management of complex technology projects

I offer Project Management and Tech Lead services, supporting companies, startups, software houses, and web agencies in managing and coordinating IT projects of any complexity. The goal is to ensure on-time delivery, budget adherence, and technically solid solutions, with a single technical and strategic reference.

What I do concretely

  • Planning, organizing, and managing technology projects
  • Coordinating internal teams and external vendors
  • Technical supervision as Tech Lead on architecture and development
  • Defining roadmaps and project milestones
  • Monitoring progress and managing risks
  • Optimizing processes and tools to increase productivity and quality

When it’s useful

  • Projects must meet deadlines and budgets
  • Distributed teams or external vendors need coordination
  • Rapid and informed technical decisions are needed
  • Need a single point of contact understanding both business and technology
  • Strategic support is required for product evolution

Who benefits

  • Companies seeking professionally managed IT projects
  • Startups needing an expert Tech Lead to guide development
  • Software houses and web agencies needing project or team coordination support
  • Technical teams aiming to optimize workflows and processes
  • Entrepreneurs and decision-makers seeking clarity and control over tech development

My approach

My approach combines rigorous project management with technical consulting: I not only coordinate but ensure solutions are scalable, secure, and aligned with business goals. The focus is always on transparency, clear communication, and tangible results.

items.title: B2B RELATIONSHIP MANAGEMENT
items.description: Optimizing collaboration before, during, and after sales.
items.details:
B2B Relationship Management

Optimizing collaboration before, during, and after sales

I provide B2B Relationship Management services for companies, software houses, and web agencies, helping them improve communication and collaboration with clients and vendors. The goal is to ensure clear processes, strong partnerships, and productive relationships, reducing friction, inefficiencies, and operational issues.

What I do concretely

  • Coordinating and optimizing client and vendor relationships
  • Managing the pre-sales cycle: needs analysis, proposals, objective setting
  • Managing the post-sales cycle: support, follow-up, satisfaction monitoring, feedback management
  • Creating clear processes and standardized procedures
  • Improving communication between internal teams and external partners
  • Supporting conflict resolution or critical issues in B2B relationships

When it’s useful

  • Relationships with clients or vendors are fragmented or unclear
  • You want to increase efficiency, collaboration, and partner satisfaction
  • Strategic support in managing pre- and post-sales cycles is needed
  • You want to reduce errors, delays, or misunderstandings between teams, clients, and vendors
  • A single point of contact is necessary to coordinate communication and processes

Who benefits

  • Companies seeking to improve commercial and operational interactions
  • Startups managing clients and vendors in a structured way to grow quickly
  • Software houses and web agencies wanting to optimize client and partner relationships
  • Sales or technical teams needing clear processes and efficient coordination
  • Entrepreneurs and managers seeking control and visibility over all B2B relationships

My approach

My approach combines organizational management, effective communication, and practical strategies. I don’t just coordinate relationships, I create sustainable processes that reduce friction, improve partner satisfaction, and increase overall productivity.

items.title: TRAINING
items.description: I organize courses on technologies and best practices to improve internal skills.
items.details:
Technology Training

Enhancing internal skills and boosting your team

I offer training on technologies, methodologies, and IT best practices, designed for companies, startups, software houses, and web agencies. The goal is to make teams more autonomous, efficient, and up-to-date, improving project quality and reducing dependence on external consultants.

What I do concretely

  • Customized courses on frontend, backend, and mobile development
  • Training on software architectures, integrations, and APIs
  • Workshops on agile methodologies, project management, and DevOps
  • Practical sessions on React, Vue, Angular, Node.js, .NET, React Native
  • Supporting teams during real projects to transfer practical skills
  • Providing personalized documentation and training materials

When it’s useful

  • Internal teams need technological updates
  • You want to reduce dependence on external consultants
  • Improving processes, quality, and productivity is required
  • New technologies or methodologies need to be introduced in the company
  • You want to boost professional growth of team members

Who benefits

  • Internal teams of companies and startups wanting to grow quickly
  • Software houses and web agencies updating staff or transferring project-specific skills
  • Entrepreneurs and managers wanting to strengthen strategic and technical skills of their team
  • Junior teams or new hires needing effective onboarding

My approach

Training combines theory and practice, with a modular approach tailored to the team’s needs. I don’t just explain technologies, I teach how to apply them in real projects to create immediately usable skills.
